transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha ji.
Customer: Ha ji sir.
Executive: Kaun? Hello?
Customer: Ha ji sir, kahan se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Main Bela Stone se.
Executive: Achha achha ji, namaskar sir, bataiye.
Customer: Sasan ji Ram ji hai.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Wo hamare manager the, wo kahan gaye?
Executive: Priyanshu hi bol raha hu sir main.
Customer: Achha achha. Aise kaise bol rahe ho aap?
Executive: Achha nahi wo aapne us pe kiya hai na to is pe pata nahi chalta kiska call aaya hai. Aur main lunch pe aaya hua hu.
Customer: Sasan Sasan ji ko bhejo aap.
Executive: Ha sir, kal chutti pe tha main.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Kal chutti pe tha main.
Customer: Ha to yehi to main bol raha hu mujhe. Ha aaj aa gaya hu main lunch pe hu bas aapko 10 minute mein lagaun sir aapko pahunch ke upar.
Customer: Ha laga lo laga lo.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks for previous manager.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that he is Priyanshu.
- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- manager, callback, introduction
